document_data.title: A Matter of Thorns
document_data.author: [[James Ward|James M. Ward]]
document_data.mainbody: '''"A Matter of Thorns"''' is a short story by [[James Ward|James M. Ward]] included in the 1994 anthology ''[[Realms of Infamy]]''.
document_data.Summary: After the newly-arisen young [[Lord Stone]] kills the long-serving gardener of [[Castle Stone]], a massive and malevolent [[rose]] bush rises out of the castle's gardens.
